brief: This is a simple Pulse oscillator.

methods.name: width()
methods.desc: Changes the pulse width of the pulse oscillator.

methods.name: freq()
methods.desc: Changes the frequency of the pulse oscillator in Hz.

methods.name: amp()
methods.desc: Changes the amplitude/volume of the pulse oscillator.

methods.name: add()
methods.desc: Offset the output of this generator by given value.

methods.name: pan()
methods.desc: Pan the oscillator in a stereo panorama.

description: This is a simple Pulse oscillator.
name: Pulse
